participant_1.background:
My name is william , but people call me bill.
I live with my wife and kids.
I have three beautiful dogs and one cat.
I live near grand rapids , michigan.
I own a small farm where i herd cattle.

participant_2.background:
My college courses are on philosophy and history.
I write short stories in my document tab with the use of a prompting app.
My glasses are held together by tiger printed duct tape.
My newly bought laptop has a bum battery.
I ride my bike to class since its only a mile away.

content.text: Hello! My name is Bill. I'm a farmer from Grand Rapids, Michigan.
Hello, Bill! My name is Sarah. I'm a college student studying philosophy and history.
Nice to meet you, Sarah! What are you studying in college?
I'm studying philosophy and history. I'm really interested in learning about the human condition and how we got to where we are today.
That's a great field of study! I'm sure you'll learn a lot. What do you want to do with your degree?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going to law school, but I'm not sure. I'm still exploring my options.
Well, I'm sure you'll figure it out. You seem like a smart person.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, write, and go for walks. I also like to bike to class. It's only a mile away, so it's not too bad.
That sounds like fun! I like to read and write too. I also like to play video games.
I've never been much of a gamer. I'm more of a bookworm.
Well, I'm sure we can find something to do together.
I'm sure we can. I'm always looking for new friends.
Me too. It's nice to meet you, Sarah.
It's nice to meet you too, Bill.
